run.summary: Investigated MCP server startup failures - identified transient npm/npx timeout issue during parallel cold starts

what-worked.item: Diagnosed root cause: 9 npx -y calls in parallel overwhelm npm registry lookups
All servers recovered after initial timeout - transient not permanent
Confirmed no IDE MCP server configured in Claude Code (separate from Desktop)
Pre-cached several MCP packages to reduce future cold start times

what-didnt.item: Some npx packages don't support --version flag cleanly (context7, filesystem)

next-session.item: Consider staggering MCP server startup to avoid parallel npm overload
Add IDE MCP server to Claude Code if needed for LSP integration
